column5: Casa Bella is a cozy, comfortable carriage house nestled amid live oaks, magnolia, lemon, and crape myrtle trees, bamboo, papyrus, firecrackers bushes, and wisteria. Our gardens are so peaceful and quiet right in the heart of San Antonio's historic Tobin Hill district and within easy walking distance to gourmet restaurants, bars, and just a few minutes from the River Walk by car.
